MyProject

Class TextTokenizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • MyProject.TextTokenizer

  • public class TextTokenizer
extends java.lang.Object
    TextTokenizer class used to tokenize the texts and store them as Document objects.
    See Also:
    http://blog.datumbox.com/developing-a-naive-bayes-text-classifier-in-java/

      static java.lang.String[] extractKeywords(java.lang.String text)
      A simple method to extract the keywords from the text.
      static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getKeywordCounts(java.lang.String[] keywordArray)
      Counts the number of occurrences of the keywords inside the text.
      static java.lang.String preprocess(java.lang.String text)
      Preprocess the text by removing punctuation, duplicate spaces and lowercasing it.
      static Document tokenize(java.lang.String text)
      Tokenizes the document and returns a Document Object.
